mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map showing the railroad connections with the city of Norfolk, Virginia / designed by Walter Sharp, Norfolk, Va
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mason, M. W.
Matthews-Northrup Company.
Sharp, Walter.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 67 x 60 cm. on sheet 72 x 64 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map covers the area within a thousand mile radius of Norfolk.
Tables below map: Water transportation routes: Steamship lines. Steamboat lines. -- Norfolk's importance as an entrÃªpot.
"M. W. Mason, Real Estate Agent, 17 Granby Street, Norfolk, Va." printed in red at top of map, inside neatline.
"13206" printed in lower margin just outside neatline.
A newspaper article about "Port Norfolk" reprinted from the Daily Norfolk News and Courier is re-printed on verso.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: has several tears but no loss of text.
Scale [ca. 1:2,852,200]; Approximate scale 45 miles to one inch.
